title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Behavioral Observation and Motor Imagery Training for Motor Skill Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce core movements of the 'O-soto-gari' judo technique (right-foot angle, ankle speed) with 80% accuracy using AOMI training within 6 weeks.
Learners achieve a 20% improvement in self-efficacy questionnaire scores during the project period.
Learners can generate structured mental representations of motor skill acquisition processes using team-produced AOMI video materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
